verses.verse: They took their journey <S%H5265><s%> from Elim, <S%H362><s%> and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H5512><s%> which is between Elim <S%H362><s%> and Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> after their departing out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

The whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%>

and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H4310><s%> "We wish that we had died <S%H4191><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when we sat <S%H3427><s%> by the meat <S%H1320><s%> pots, <S%H5518><s%> when we ate <S%H398><s%> our fill <S%H7648><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> for you have brought us out <S%H3318><s%> into this wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> this whole assembly <S%H6951><s%> with hunger. <S%H7458><s%>"

Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H4305><s%> I will rain bread <S%H3899><s%> from the sky <S%H8064><s%> for you, <S%H5971><s%> and the people shall go out <S%H3318><s%> and gather <S%H3950><s%> a day <S%H1697><s%>'s portion every day, <S%H3117><s%> that I may test <S%H5254><s%> them, <S%H3212><s%> whether they will walk in my law, <S%H8451><s%> or not.

It shall come to pass on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that they shall prepare <S%H3559><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> they bring in, <S%H935><s%> and it shall be twice <S%H4932><s%> as much as they gather <S%H3950><s%> daily. <S%H3117><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "At evening, <S%H6153><s%> then you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has brought you out <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

and in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> then you shall see <S%H7200><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> because he hears <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> against Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Who are we, <S%H5168><s%> that you murmur against us? <S%H3885><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Now Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> you meat <S%H1320><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to satisfy <S%H7646><s%> you; <S%H3068><s%> because Yahweh hears <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> which you murmur <S%H3885><s%> against him. <S%H5168><s%> And who are we? Your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> are not against us, <S%H3068><s%> but against Yahweh."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Tell <S%H559><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H7126><s%> 'Come near before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he has heard <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings. <S%H8519><s%>'"

It happened, <S%H175><s%> as Aaron spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and behold, <S%H3519><s%> the glory of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud. <S%H6051><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Speak <S%H1696><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H996><s%> 'At evening you shall eat <S%H398><s%> meat, <S%H1320><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> with bread: <S%H3899><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>'"

It happened at evening <S%H6153><s%> that quail <S%H7958><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> lay <S%H7902><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

When the dew <S%H2919><s%> that lay <S%H7902><s%> had gone, <S%H5927><s%> behold, <S%H6440><s%> on the surface of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> was a small <S%H1851><s%> round thing, <S%H2636><s%> small <S%H1851><s%> as the frost <S%H3713><s%> on the ground. <S%H776><s%>

When the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H559><s%> they said one <S%H376><s%> to another, <S%H251><s%> "What is it? <S%H4478><s%>" For they didn't <S%H3045><s%> know what it was. <S%H4872><s%> Moses said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3899><s%> "It is the bread which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you to eat. <S%H402><s%>"

This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded: <S%H6680><s%> "Gather <S%H3950><s%> of it everyone <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating; <S%H400><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> a head, <S%H1538><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of your persons, <S%H5315><s%> you shall take <S%H3947><s%> it, <S%H376><s%> every man for those who are in his tent. <S%H168><s%>"
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3950><s%> and gathered some more, <S%H7235><s%> some less. <S%H4591><s%>

When they measured <S%H4058><s%> it with an omer, <S%H6016><s%> he who gathered much <S%H7235><s%> had nothing over, <S%H5736><s%> and he who gathered little <S%H4591><s%> had no lack. <S%H2637><s%> They gathered <S%H3950><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating. <S%H400><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H376><s%> "Let no one leave <S%H3498><s%> of it until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>"

Notwithstanding they didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> but some <S%H582><s%> of them left <S%H3498><s%> of it until the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and it bred <S%H7311><s%> worms, <S%H8438><s%> and became foul: <S%H887><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was angry with them. <S%H7107><s%>

They gathered <S%H3950><s%> it morning by morning, <S%H1242><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating. <S%H400><s%> When the sun <S%H8121><s%> grew hot, <S%H2552><s%> it melted. <S%H4549><s%>

It happened that on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they gathered <S%H3950><s%> twice <S%H4932><s%> as much bread, <S%H3899><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> omers <S%H6016><s%> for each one, <S%H259><s%> and all the rulers <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3068><s%> "This is that which Yahweh has spoken, <S%H1696><s%> <S%H4279><s%> 'Tomorrow is a solemn rest, <S%H7677><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Bake <S%H644><s%> that which you want to bake, <S%H644><s%> and boil <S%H1310><s%> that which you want to boil; <S%H1310><s%> and all that <S%H3605><s%> remains over <S%H5736><s%> lay up <S%H3240><s%> for yourselves to be kept <S%H4931><s%> until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>'"
They laid it up <S%H3240><s%> until the morning, <S%H1242><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> asked, <S%H6680><s%> and it didn't <S%H887><s%> become foul, neither was there any worm in it. <S%H7415><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Eat <S%H398><s%> that today, <S%H3117><s%> for today <S%H3117><s%> is a Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Today <S%H3117><s%> you shall not find <S%H4672><s%> it in the field. <S%H7704><s%>
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall gather <S%H3950><s%> it, <S%H7637><s%> but on the seventh day <S%H3117><s%> is the Sabbath. <S%H7676><s%> In it there shall be none."
It happened on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that some of the people <S%H5971><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to gather, <S%H3950><s%> and they found none. <S%H4672><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "How long do you refuse <S%H3985><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and my laws? <S%H8451><s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the Sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> therefore he gives <S%H5414><s%> you on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of two days. <S%H3117><s%> Everyone <S%H376><s%> stay <S%H3427><s%> in his place. <S%H376><s%> Let no one go out <S%H3318><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>"
So the people <S%H5971><s%> rested <S%H7673><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> its name <S%H8034><s%> Manna, <S%H4478><s%> and it was like coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%> and its taste <S%H2940><s%> was like wafers <S%H6838><s%> with honey. <S%H1706><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> <S%H4393><s%> 'Let an omer-full <S%H6016><s%> of it be kept <S%H4931><s%> throughout your generations, <S%H1755><s%> that they may see <S%H7200><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> with which I fed <S%H398><s%> you in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> when I brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>'"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> a <S%H259><s%> pot, <S%H6803><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> an omer-full <S%H6016><s%> of <S%H4393><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> in it, <S%H3240><s%> and lay it up before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to be kept <S%H4931><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>"
As Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so Aaron <S%H175><s%> laid it up <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Testimony, <S%H5715><s%> to be kept. <S%H4931><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> the manna <S%H4478><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> until they came <S%H935><s%> to an inhabited <S%H3427><s%> land. <S%H776><s%> They ate <S%H398><s%> the manna <S%H4478><s%> until they came <S%H935><s%> to the borders <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
Now an omer <S%H6016><s%> is the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah. <S%H374><s%>
